page.title: 17EVENTS IN OUR VILLAGE
page.content:
Our village is rather isolated and so quite a lot goes on within the village for the local people.There is a good community spirit and people are good at supporting events that take place.
We have a good Village Hall in Holcombe Rogus and most events take place there,such as Dances,Sales and Fayres.Colonel and Mrs Dobree also invite the local people to the lovely Great Hall at Holcombe Court for special occasions.We also have the Church Fete on their lawn each summer.
A lot of special events take place at All Saints Church.Our Rector,Reverend Marsh has been very good at organising events and interesting people in the church.Unfortunately, he is just about to leave our village-July,1985
